title: How to Make Mango Strawberry Popsicles

steps.headline: Puree the mango in a blender or food processor.
steps.description: Make sure that it's smooth and not chunky.

steps.headline: Blend the lime juice and agave nectar in.
Pour the puree into your molds.
Let it chill for 30 minutes.
steps.description: Chilling it before adding the strawberries will thicken the mixture so that the strawberries can't all go to the bottom.

steps.headline: Chill until completely frozen.
steps.description: This can take up to 6 hours.

steps.headline: Juice the mango.
steps.description: Juice it so that there is a reasonable amount of pulp left.

steps.headline: Take the pulp out and put it in a separate bowl.
steps.description: Do not take the mango juice out.

steps.headline: Juice the strawberries in the same blender that you juiced the mango in.
steps.description: You can take the strawberry pulp out if you want.

steps.headline: Scoop about a tablespoon of mango pulp into each mold.
steps.description: Add the strawberry pulp if you have any.

steps.headline: Pour the strawberry and mango juice over the pulp into the molds.

text: Mango with Strawberry Pieces Puree the mango in a blender or food processor. Make sure that it's smooth and not chunky. Blend the lime juice and agave nectar in.  Pour the puree into your molds.  Let it chill for 30 minutes. Chilling it before adding the strawberries will thicken the mixture so that the strawberries can't all go to the bottom. Mix in the strawberry pieces.  Chill until completely frozen. This can take up to 6 hours. Strawberry with Mango Pieces Juice the mango. Juice it so that there is a reasonable amount of pulp left. Take the pulp out and put it in a separate bowl. Do not take the mango juice out. Juice the strawberries in the same blender that you juiced the mango in. You can take the strawberry pulp out if you want. Scoop about a tablespoon of mango pulp into each mold. Add the strawberry pulp if you have any. Pour the strawberry and mango juice over the pulp into the molds.  Freeze overnight.
